price: E cumpri a oração e concedei az-zakah. E o que quer de bom que antecipeis a vossas almas, encontrá-lo-eis junto de Allah. Por certo, Allah, do que fazeis, é Onividente.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُواْ لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنۡ خَيۡرٖ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wamā tuqaddimū li-anfusikum min khayrin tajidūhu ʿinda al-lahi inna al-laha bimā taʿmalūna baṣīrun
